Package com.accele.gage

Interface NativeValueHoldable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextureFilterParameter, TextureWrapParameter
    public interface NativeValueHoldable
    Represents a type which has an underlying value used in direct OpenGL API calls.

    This interface is used to act as an intermediary between GAGE API calls and its underlying implementation, OpenGL. For example, TextureWrapParameter uses this interface to provide the actual integer value used to specify the target parameter in OpenGL.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    William Garland

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getNativeValue()
      Returns the native value used in direct OpenGL API calls.
